channel.title: Projects on Alan Ryan
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Alan Ryan

item.title: Studio NousNous
item.description: A Shopify site for the Dutch Studio NousNous. Original design is by Thomas van Dongen, I have been tweaking the code under the creative direction of Hakim El Amrani. Visit the site here

item.title: Sydney Brown
item.description: A Shopify site selling Vegan Shoes and Bags. An almost three year collaboration, with a reboot in the offing. Visit the store here

item.title: Abstract Art Store
item.description: Abstract art is art that does not attempt to represent an accurate depiction of a visual reality but instead uses shapes, colours, forms and gestural marks to achieve its effect. Yes indeed. This is a sample Shopify store, easily adapted to something more practical and less abstract. See it live here

item.title: Umbrella Store
item.description: A quick and simple Shopify store, for demo purposes only. View Site

item.title: Self-Contained
item.description: A garden design business. My own personal project. Built using Hugo, a static site generator. It needs more content and time. See it here

item.title: Oporto Call
item.description: A business idea for a relocation and tourist service for the City of Porto and beyond. The site is built with 11ty. It integrates a Snipcart checkout View site

item.title: Word Reformed
item.description: A translation & content writing service. A standard Wordpress site, it’s more about the content. View site

item.title: Wine Data App
item.description: A Port Wine Data App created using R View the App

item.title: Template Design
item.description: This is a simple sample site easily customized to suit any small business. It’s a modified version of Andy Bell’s Learn Eleventy From Scratch tutorial, but it’s a great example of what can easily be achieved with the 11ty static site generator. View site
